metadata.title: CVE-2024-45160 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect credential validation in LemonLDAP::NG 2.18.x and 2.19.x before2.19.2 allows attackers to bypass OAuth2 client authentication via an emptyclient_password parameter (client secret).

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
